oshiSkill.name: マスコット創造  ("Mascot Creation")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] You may reveal one Mascot from your deck, add it to your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

spOshiSkill.name: フブキングダム  ("Fubukingdom")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When one of your White Holomen downs an opponent’s Holomen, for every 2 Mascots attached to all of your Holomen, roll a die. If at least one odd number is rolled, your opponent loses 1 Life.

oshiSkill.name: Ahoy
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Bloom one of your #3rdGen Holomen that Bloomed this turn again by using a Holomen from your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 出航~!  ("Shukkou~!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Deal 50 special damage to either the opposing Center Holomen or Collaboration Holomen for each Holomen stacked under your Center Holomen, Houshou Marine.

oshiSkill.name: ぽえぽえぽえ～  ("poepoepoe~")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your center Holomen is Sakamata Chloe, you may use this ability: Look at the top three cards of your deck. You may either archive all of them or place them back on top of your deck in any order.

spOshiSkill.name: 人生リセットボタン  ("Life Reset Button")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Count the cards in your hand. Return all cards in your hand and all Holomen from your Archive to your deck, then shuffle it. For each card returned from your hand to the deck, draw one card.

oshiSkill.name: ねえ”え”え”え”え”え”("Neeeeeee")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] When you roll a die due to the ability of Murasaki Shion, you may reroll the die once..

spOshiSkill.name: シオンのすごい魔法  ("Shion's Amazing Magic")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When your purple Center Holomen uses an Art, you may activate this effect: Deal 50 special damage to your opponent's Center Holomen for each Cheer attached to it.

oshiSkill.name: ("Sampling")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Archive 2 cards from your hand, and return 2 holomems with #EN from your Archive to your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 死神ラップ  ("Shinigami Rap")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] If your center Holomen is <Mori Calliope>, you can use this ability: For the duration of this turn, your <Mori Calliope> can use the same Arts twice, once after using it.

name: Shirakami Fubuki
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Shirakami Fubuki
giftEffect: みんなと一緒! This holomem may have two Mascots with different names attached.

skills.name: マスコットたちの舞宴
skills.description: For each Mascot attached to your holomems, this Art gains +20 power.

name: Shirogane Noel
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Shirogane Noel
bloomEffect: ノエちゃんの勇姿……………: When this Blooms from a Debut holomem, reveal a Debut, 1st Bloom, or Spot holomem with #Gen3 from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

skills.name: 目に焼き付けるんだゾ♡
3期生ぱわー
skills.description: (Collab position only) For each other Holomen on your stage with the #Gen3 tag, this Arts gets +20. However, the number of Holomen counted is limited to 4..

name: Pavolia Reine
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Pavolia Reine
collabEffect: You may send 1 Cheer from your Archive to any of your holomems.

name: Pavolia Reine
bloomEffect: For each color of Cheer on your Stage, restore 10 HP to one of your holomems.

skills.description: You may send 1 Cheer from your Archive to any of your holomems.

name: Pavolia Reine
bloomEffect: Reveal a Tatang from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

skills.name: Spicy Night
skills.description: If there are at least two colors of Cheer on your Stage, this Art gains +20 power.

name: Pavolia Reine
bloomEffect: Reveal a Cheer from your Cheer Deck and send it to one of your holomems. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.

skills.description: For each color of Cheer on your Stage, this Art gains +20 power.

name: Ookami Mio
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Houshou Marine

skills.name: 宝鐘海賊団船長の宝鐘マリンですぅー!

extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies

name: Houshou Marine
collabEffect: Deal 20 special damage to your opponent's Collab holomem.

name: Houshou Marine
bloomEffect: Deal 20 special damage to your opponent's Collab holomem.

name: Houshou Marine
bloomEffect: Reveal a card named Houshou Marine from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. You may only use the Bloom Effect <Houshou Pirates> once per turn.

name: Houshou Marine
bloomEffect: You may return 1 holomem from your Archive to your hand. Then, if this card has 3 or more holomems stacked under it, deal 50 special damage to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem.

skills.name: アフターパーティ
skills.description: For each holomem stacked under this one, this Art gains +20 power.

name: Nakiri Ayame

skills.description: If this holomem has a Tool or Mascot attached, deal 30 special damage to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem.

extraEffect: When this Holomen is downed, your life is reduced by 2

name: Sakamata Chloe
extraEffect: This Holomen can be included in your deck in any number of copies.

name: Sakamata Chloe
collabEffect: Look at the top three cards of your Deck. Reveal one that is a 2nd Bloom holomem with #SecretSocietyholoX and put it into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Sakamata Chloe
bloomEffect: Look at the top 3 cards of your Cheer Deck. Reveal 1 Cheer from among them and send it to any of your holomems. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Sakamata Chloe
giftEffect: (Once per turn) When you reveal cards with this holomem's Art <holoX Slots>, you may put 1 of them that is a Support card into your hand instead of Archiving it.

skills.description: You may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. For each holomem revealed, this Art gains +20 power. Then Archive the revealed cards.

name: Sakamata Chloe
giftEffect: (Once per turn) When you reveal cards with this holomem's Art <holoX Slots>, if the three revealed cards are all holomems with the same Bloom level, your opponent loses 1 LIFE.

skills.description: You may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. For each holomem revealed, this Art gains +20 power. Then Archive the revealed cards.

name: イヌ(Inu)
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 Power. If this is attached to <Sakamata Chloe>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem with this Mascot attached Downs one of your opponent's holomems, send a Cheer from your Archive to one of your holomems with #SecretSocietyholoX. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: UDIN
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached gain +10 Power. If this is attached to <Kureiji Ollie>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem that this Mascot is attached to Blooms, draw 1 card from your Deck then Archive 1 card from your hand. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Death-sensei
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Mori Calliope>, it gains the following effect: the Cheer requirements of all Arts of the holomem this is attached to become Colorless. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: すこん部 (Sukonbu)
ability: The holomem with this Fan attached has +10 HP. This Fan may only be attached to your <Shirakami Fubuki>, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: 白銀聖騎士団 (Shirogane Dan'in)
ability: Whenever the holomem with this Fan attached takes damage, it takes -10 damage. This Fan may only be attached to your <Shirogane Noel>, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: ミオファ(Miofa)
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, draw a card. This Fan may only be attached to your <Ookami Mio>, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: 塩っこ(Shiokko)
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached gain +10 power. When the holomem with this Fan attached takes damage, Archive this Fan. This Fan may only be attached to your <Murasaki Shion>, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
